trans-unit.id: This value is too long. It should have {{ limit }} characters or less.
trans-unit.source: This value is too long. It should have {{ limit }} characters or less.
trans-unit.target: Ta wartość jest zbyt długa. Powinna mieć {{ limit }} znaków lub mniej.

trans-unit.id: There is already an account with this email
trans-unit.source: There is already an account with this email
trans-unit.target: Istnieje już konto z tym adresem e-mail

trans-unit.id: You should agree to our terms.
trans-unit.source: You should agree to our terms.
trans-unit.target: Powinieneś zgodzić się z naszymi warunkami.

trans-unit.id: Your password should be at least {{ limit }} characters
trans-unit.source: Your password should be at least {{ limit }} characters
trans-unit.target: Twoje hasło powinno mieć co najmniej {{ limit }} znaków

trans-unit.id: Comment cannot be longer than {{ limit }} characters
trans-unit.source: Comment cannot be longer than {{ limit }} characters
trans-unit.target: Komentarz nie może być dłuższy niż {{ limit }} znaków
